actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to limit the authority of the Secretary of Health and Human Services with respect to regulation of vitamin and mineral products for over-the-counter human use.
subjects: Department of Health and Human Services

summary.text: Prohibits the Secretary of Health and Human Services (formerly, the Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare) from promulgating a proposed rule applicable to vitamin and mineral products for over-the-counter human use published on March 16, 1979, or from taking any other action which would have the same effect as such proposed rule.

titles.title: A bill to limit the authority of the Secretary of Health and Human Services with respect to regulation of vitamin and mineral products for over-the-counter human use.
